short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Untangle your inbox with chat. Find That Email is a Chrome extension that helps you find emails faster using AI.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find That Email helps you navigate your inbox faster. FindThatEmail's AI search helps find emails faster using natural language. You can simply search for things like "receipts from March" or "board meeting in July" to find the relevant emails you're looking for.
